item.title: Steps to create a personal site with hugo
item.description: A personal site could do much with your interview and make you more competitive! In this paper I would share with you detailed steps for how to create a new public site using hugo, which is one of latest tools for building a site. Git Go > 1.11 brew install hugo or port install hugo if you are using MacPorts. Then you can simply jump to step 2 to continue.
